merchantDashboard.title: Create Payment Pages via Merchant Dashboard
description: The Klump payment page builder allows you to create payment pages for various purposes. An example could be a fundraiser for a birthday party or product/service you wish to sell to your customers.
You can create a Klump Payment Page directly from the merchant dashboard. Simply log in, locate and click on Payment Pages in the sidebar menu. Follow the prompt to create your first payment page.

api.title: Create Payment Pages via API
description: You can also create payment pages programmatically by making an API call to our payment page endpoint.
The process is pretty straightforward. When you make this request, a payment page URL will be generated which can then be used to collect payments.

example.code:
